trans-unit.source: Draws a series of connected lines and curves.
trans-unit.target: Desenha uma série de linhas e curvas conectadas.

trans-unit.source: The Path object can draw closed or open shapes, multiple shapes, and even curved shapes.
trans-unit.target: O objeto de caminho pode desenhar formas fechadas ou abertas, várias formas e até mesmo formas curvas.

trans-unit.source: Unlike the <xref:System.Windows.Shapes.Line> and <xref:System.Windows.Shapes.Polyline> objects, you can use this object to draw curves.
trans-unit.target: Ao contrário de <xref:System.Windows.Shapes.Line>e <xref:System.Windows.Shapes.Polyline>objetos, você pode usar esse objeto para desenhar curvas.</xref:System.Windows.Shapes.Polyline> </xref:System.Windows.Shapes.Line>

trans-unit.source: See the <xref:System.Windows.Shapes.Path.Data%2A> property for a description of the shapes that the Path element supports.
trans-unit.target: Consulte o <xref:System.Windows.Shapes.Path.Data%2A>propriedade para obter uma descrição das formas que suportam o elemento de caminho.</xref:System.Windows.Shapes.Path.Data%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Shapes.Path"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Shapes.Path"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Geometry"></xref> that specifies the shape to be drawn.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Geometry"> </xref> que especifica o formato a ser desenhada.

trans-unit.source: To draw simple shapes, use the <xref:System.Windows.Media.EllipseGeometry>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.LineGeometry>, and <xref:System.Windows.Media.RectangleGeometry> objects.
trans-unit.target: Para desenhar formas simples, use o <xref:System.Windows.Media.EllipseGeometry>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.LineGeometry>, e <xref:System.Windows.Media.RectangleGeometry>objetos.</xref:System.Windows.Media.RectangleGeometry> </xref:System.Windows.Media.LineGeometry> </xref:System.Windows.Media.EllipseGeometry>

trans-unit.source: To draw curves, arcs, or complex shapes, use the <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathGeometry> object.
trans-unit.target: Para desenhar curvas, arcos ou formas complexas, use o <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathGeometry>objeto.</xref:System.Windows.Media.PathGeometry>

trans-unit.source: To create a composite geometry, use a <xref:System.Windows.Media.GeometryGroup>.
trans-unit.target: Para criar uma geometria composta, use <xref:System.Windows.Media.GeometryGroup>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.GeometryGroup>

trans-unit.source: To combine geometries, use a <xref:System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry>.
trans-unit.target: Para combinar geometrias, use <xref:System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry>

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Property Element Usage ``` singleGeometry ``` ## XAML Attribute Usage ``` ``` ## XAML Values *singleGeometry* A single object element that derives from .
trans-unit.target: # # Uso do elemento de propriedade de XAML ``` singleGeometry ``` # # uso do atributo XAML ``` ``` # # XAML valores *singleGeometry* um elemento único objeto que deriva de .

trans-unit.source: This can be one of the following: - One of the simple geometries <xref:System.Windows.Media.EllipseGeometry>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.LineGeometry>, or <xref:System.Windows.Media.RectangleGeometry>.
trans-unit.target: Isso pode ser um dos seguintes:-um simples geometrias <xref:System.Windows.Media.EllipseGeometry>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.LineGeometry>, ou <xref:System.Windows.Media.RectangleGeometry>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.RectangleGeometry> </xref:System.Windows.Media.LineGeometry> </xref:System.Windows.Media.EllipseGeometry>

trans-unit.source: - A single <xref:System.Windows.Media.GeometryGroup>, which supports other geometries as child elements.
trans-unit.target: -Uma única <xref:System.Windows.Media.GeometryGroup>, que oferece suporte a outros geometrias como elementos filho.</xref:System.Windows.Media.GeometryGroup>

trans-unit.source: See XAML Values section for <xref:System.Windows.Media.GeometryGroup>.
trans-unit.target: Consulte a seção de valores de XAML para <xref:System.Windows.Media.GeometryGroup>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.GeometryGroup>

trans-unit.source: - A <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathGeometry>, which supports child object elements that establish a path geometry object model of figures and segments.
trans-unit.target: -A <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathGeometry>, que oferece suporte a elementos de objeto filho que estabelecer um modelo de objeto de geometria de caminho de figuras e segmentos.</xref:System.Windows.Media.PathGeometry>

trans-unit.source: See XAML Values section for <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathGeometry>.
trans-unit.target: Consulte a seção de valores de XAML para <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathGeometry>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.PathGeometry>

trans-unit.source: *moveAndDrawCommands* One or more move and draw commands.
trans-unit.target: *moveAndDrawCommands* uma ou mais mover e comandos de desenho.

trans-unit.source: For the complete syntax, see [Path Markup Syntax](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter a sintaxe completa, consulte [sintaxe de marcação de caminho](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|, |
trans-unit.target: # # Informações de propriedade de dependência | | | |-|-| | Campo de identificador | | | Definir propriedades de metadados `true`|, |

trans-unit.source: A description of the shape to be drawn.
trans-unit.target: Uma descrição da forma a ser desenhada.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Shapes.Path.Data*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica o <xref:System.Windows.Shapes.Path.Data*>DependencyProperty.</xref:System.Windows.Shapes.Path.Data*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.
